summary: REQ-22 appears to be addressed by updating the frontend App footer to a simple copyright line without external attribution (per the diff summary), but the diff evidence is truncated so itâ€™s not fully verifiable that *all* caffeine.* references are removed from every user-facing UI string. REQ-23 is not evidenced as implemented because no documentation/config-example files are shown as modified where caffeine.xyz/caffine.xyz references would be removed/replaced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove or replace any references to the domain "caffeine.xyz" or "caffine.xyz" in repository documentation and configuration examples (use neutral placeholder like example.com).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only 3 modified files (App.tsx, frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json) and does not show any edits to documentation/config example files where such domain references would be removed/replaced. Therefore there is no concrete evidence REQ-23 was implemented.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (only summarizes other docs; does not show those docs were edited)
<file-diff>: Modified files list (no docs/config files modified)

missing_requirements.requirement: No other user-facing UI text contains caffeine.ai/caffeine.xyz/caffine.xyz.
missing_requirements.reason: While the summary indicates the footer attribution was removed, App.tsx is truncated and no other UI files are shown/checked. The diff summary does not provide evidence that all user-facing UI strings across the site were audited/updated to remove caffeine.* references.
evidence: <file-diff>: only one frontend UI file shown as modified

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project metadata/snapshot files (project_state.json version/summary and frontend-file-summaries.txt content).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically about removing caffeine.xyz/caffeine.ai references from UI footer and docs/config examples. Updating project state/summaries is not requested as part of these requirements.
